name: DD_DIA_CMS_TELEMEDICINE
description: This table contains data elements submitted for CMS ESRD monthly forms.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: PAT_HAD_TELEMEDICINE_VISIT_YN
columns.description: It stores whether the dialysis patient had a telemedicine visit in the reporting month.

columns.name: NUMBER_TELEMEDICINE_VISITS
columns.description: It stores the number of telemedicine visits in the reporting month.

columns.name: TELEMEDICINE_LAST_VISIT_DATE
columns.description: It stores the last telemedicine visit date for the reporting month.
